text: Kuwait Airways is Kuwait's national airline. It began in 1954.Kuwait 2009 Hospitality Market Overview (Kuwait: Global Markets, 2010), p. 12 It has grown very fast. It is one of the largest airlines in the Middle East. It flies to 42 cities in different countries. Kuwait Airways has 22 aircraft (with 4 more on order). The average age of their aircraft is 17.4 years. == References == Category:Airlines of the Middle East Category:Organizations based in Kuwait
title: Kuwait Airways
